text: 27.29: Sng 69.19 naŋga, Ais 53.3Kamata siki punzɨmbunzɨ naŋga haŋandɨhin mɨŋata, aru miku ndu mɨraŋgupihupi maña musa mɨŋata nuŋandɨ miku hañɨ tamamu. Kamata nuŋandɨ kuma kandɨ samba hambu kuki tɨmɨ mu mɨŋandɨhuramamu. Kamata nuŋɨrɨm tanda mɨkwɨmɨkwɨtɨndɨ nɨmavamba ambasuvamu, Aviŋgɨvɨ Juda hatindu aru miku, vamu.27.29 Saŋganzara haŋɨnɨŋ Jisasɨŋ imbɨraramata aru miku hamaŋ kanzɨ mɨŋayahuramañandɨmu. Kandɨhamata hɨrɨvɨyɨ aru miku haŋɨnɨŋ mɨkwɨrɨ kandɨhamata haŋɨnɨŋ tamarasɨmu. Mɨkwɨrɨ ñaŋgwɨ naŋga mɨraŋgupihupi kandɨha aru miku ndu. Aru miku ndu mɨnzɨmɨnzɨmakayɨ mɨnzɨta, kuki tɨmɨ mɨnzataya mɨŋahandarasɨmu.
